iti75:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sabbesanneva na data hoti, samanabrahmanakapanaddhikavanibbakayacakanam annam panam vattham yanam malagandhavilepanam seyyavasathapadipeyyam.
iti75:3.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo avutthikasamo hoti.
iti75:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ekaccanam data hoti, ekaccanam na data hoti samanabrahmanakapanaddhikavanibbakayacakanam annam panam vattham yanam malagandhavilepanam seyyavasathapadipeyyam.
iti75:4.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo padesavassi hoti.
iti75:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sabbesamva deti, samanabrahmanakapanaddhikavanibbakayacakanam annam panam vattham yanam malagandhavilepanam seyyavasathapadipeyyam.
iti75:5.3: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo sabbatthabhivassi hoti.
iti75:5.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, tayo puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmin”ti.
iti75:11.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
